title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.35 - Authorized agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.35 - Authorized agents

State Regulations

Except as provided in section
4111.34
of this Part, no person or
organization may be the authorized agent for more than one owner for the
purpose of declaring a horse or horses in a race unless the person acting as
authorized agent is the trainer of record for the horse or horses being
declared. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4111.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
